templates.content: We offer free shipping on orders over $60. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: You can learn more about out Cocktail Subscription at the following link: https://bartesian.com/pages/bartesian-monthly-subscription
templates.name: Do you offer cocktail subscriptions?

templates.content: Orders are typically received by customers within 3-7 business days from the time ordered. Our teams are working to get orders shipped out as quickly and safely as possible. You will receive an email indicating your order is in transit with tracking information when your order has been dispatched (typically inside of 2 business days).
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: We recently launched an app update. Please ensure you have updated the app, logged out, and logged back in. You can view your order history in the right corner of the app once you click on the three lines as long as you log in under the correct email.
templates.name: My app is not working?

templates.content: Unfortunately, we cannot do split payments on an order unless you are using a Bartesian gift card or a credit card.
templates.name: Can I do split payments?

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@bartesian.com. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@bartesian.com. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Hardware maintenance issues
